/* HqSalePriceHistory.getStoreSalePriceHistoryList */
SELECT tlmpspl.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tlmpspl.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tlmpspl.SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_SALE_UPRC, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlmpspl.START_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlmpspl.END_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS END_DATE, tlmpspl.STIN_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_STIN_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_DLVR_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.PACK_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_PACK_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.PROC_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlmpspl.PROC_DT ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS PROC_DT, tlmpspl.MOD_ID
FROM TB_LG_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_LOG tlmpspl, TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tlmpspl.PROC_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} || '000000' AND #{endDate} || '999999'
AND
tlmpspl.STORE_CD = #{item}
AND tlmpspl.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = tlmpspl.STORE_CD START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = tlmpspl.STORE_CD CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = tlmpspl.STORE_CD )
AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 상품브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 상품브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND tmp.STORE_CD = tlmpspl.STORE_CD AND tmp.PROD_CD = tlmpspl.PROD_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tlmpspl.STORE_CD ORDER BY tlmpspl.STORE_CD, tlmpspl.PROD_CD, tlmpspl.PROC_DT

/* HqSalePriceHistory.getHqSalePriceHistoryList */
SELECT tlhpspl.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM, tlhpspl.SALE_UPRC, tlhpspl.B_SALE_UPRC, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlhpspl.START_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlhpspl.END_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS END_DATE, tlhpspl.STIN_SALE_UPRC, tlhpspl.B_STIN_SALE_UPRC, tlhpspl.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, tlhpspl.B_DLVR_SALE_UPRC, tlhpspl.PACK_SALE_UPRC, tlhpspl.B_PACK_SALE_UPRC, tlhpspl.PROC_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlhpspl.PROC_DT ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS PROC_DT, tlhpspl.MOD_ID
FROM TB_LG_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_LOG tlhpspl, TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE tlhpspl.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tlhpspl.PROC_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} || '000000' AND #{endDate} || '999999'
AND tlhpspl.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tlhpspl.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.PROD_CD = tlhpspl.PROD_CD ORDER BY tlhpspl.PROD_CD, tlhpspl.PROC_DT
